events.message: I received my order last week, but the product does not match the description. I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The system has classified this issue under Refund based on the customer’s request for money back due to product dissatisfaction.
A customer support representative has been assigned to handle the refund request for this case.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your order. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and details about the product so I can verify and proceed with the refund?
Sure, the order number is 567890123 and the product is a wireless headphone model X100, which didn’t work as described.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate your refund immediately, and you should receive confirmation within 3-5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate your help and look forward to the refund confirmation.
The refund process has now been completed on our end. You will receive the funds in your original payment method shortly.
We just wanted to check if you received your refund and if everything is satisfactory on your side. Please let us know.
Since the refund was successfully processed and confirmed, we are closing this support case. Thank you for contacting us.
We have sent a satisfaction survey to your email. We would appreciate it if you could share your feedback about the service.
